desc.zh: 首尔地铁（韩语：서울메트로，英语：Seoul Metro）又称韩国首都圈电铁；是指服务于韩国首尔及仁川、京畿道、忠清南道、江原特别自治道的城市轨道交通，其第一条线路于1974年8月15日正式开通运营。
desc.en: The Seoul Metro (Korean: 서울메트로, English: Seoul Metro) is also known as the Seoul Metro in Korea; It refers to the urban rail transit serving Seoul and Incheon, Gyeonggi Province, Chungcheongnam-do, and Gangwon Special Self-Governing Province in South Korea, and its first line was officially opened for operation on August 15, 1974.
